channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16638] Reduce the number of Connection's created in classes of hbase-spark module
item.description:
In HBaseResources.scala :


case class RegionResource(relation: HBaseRelation) extends ReferencedResource {

  var connection: Connection = _

  var rl: RegionLocator = _

...

  override def init(): Unit = {

    connection = ConnectionFactory.createConnection(relation.hbaseConf)

Connection is created per RegionResource.
This is not necessary.

Caching of Connection's should be provided to reduce the number of concurrent Connection's.
item.summary: Reduce the number of Connection's created in classes of hbase-spark module

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Hi, Ted Yu I have attached the patch. But there is another jira HBASE-16713 which will implement the connection caching on HBase side. If HBASE-16713 is fixed, this patch would be not necessary. So I am not sure how to deal with this? Could you please give some direction? Thanks. Adding Enis Soztutar

+1 overall

I think we should continue with this patch.
It is not clear when HBASE-16713 would be implemented.

I've started working on HBASE-16713, but it will take some time. Plus, we are not sure which branches it will go as of now. Let's continue with this patch. We can revisit this area once we have HBASE-16713 in all applicable code bases.
Thanks, Ted YuEnis Soztutar. I have submitted the second version and linked its review board. Could you please review it?

Thanks a lot, Ted. I just attached a ADDENDUM_v1 patch. Build successfully and passed related tests.

FAILURE: Integrated in Jenkins build HBase-Trunk_matrix #1768 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-Trunk_matrix/1768/)
HBASE-16638 Reduce the number of Connection's created in classes of (tedyu: rev 9d304d3b2dffdbe4fe17fa64cea1fcd3b3d52e2c)

    HBASE-16638 Reduce the number of Connection's created in classes of (tedyu: rev ee6f0ddef67e7840302640f7237d8308fc3eeadb)
  • (delete) hbase-spark/src/test/scala/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/spark/HBaseConnectionCacheSuit.scala
  • (edit) hbase-spark/src/main/scala/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/spark/HBaseConnectionCache.scala
  • (add) hbase-spark/src/test/scala/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/spark/HBaseConnectionCacheSuite.scala

HBaseConnectionCacheSuite is failing (https://builds.apache.org/view/All/job/HBase-Trunk_matrix/jdk=JDK%201.8%20(latest),label=yahoo-not-h2/1776/consoleFull).
Just found out that pre-commit is not running hbase-spark tests, that's why it wasn't caught in QA.

Actually, the test HBaseConnectionCacheSuite can pass in my local machine. I guess, in this QA testing, HBaseConnectionCacheSuite ran slower than it ran in the previous QA tests (and my local machine). I am going to submit a new patch to update time parameter passed to "HBaseConnectionCache.setTimeout".
